questions.uddipok:
Make tag questions with the following statements:

(b) But we hardly find it in us, ____?

questions.uddipok:
Change the sentences according to the directions.
(a) Corruption is one of the worst evils. (Positive)
(b) A corrupt person can do anything against morality. (Complex)
(c) People hate a corrupt person. (Passive)
(d) Nobody respects him. (Interrogative)
(e) Though we have strict laws, we are still affected by this evil. (Compound)
(f) No other person is as hated as a corrupt person. (Superlative)
(g) We hope that Bangladesh will be free from this evil. (Simple)
(h) Everybody avoids a corrupt person. (Negative)
(i) A corrupt person leads a very unhappy life. (Exclamatory)
(j) Let us all work together to make Bangladesh a corruption free country. (Assertive)

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) Very few evils are so bad as corruption.
(b) A person who is corrupt can do anything against morality.
(c) A corrupt person is hated (by people).
(d) Who respects him?
(e) We have strict laws but we are still affected by this evil.
(f) A corrupt person is the most hated person.
(g) Hopefully Bangladesh will be free from this evil./We hope Bangladesh to be free from this evil.
(h) There is nobody but avoids a corrupt person./There is nobody who does not avoid a corrupt person.
(i) What an unhappy life a corrupt person leads!
(j) We should work together to make Bangladesh a corruption free country.

questions.uddipok: Write a paragraph in 250 words on Our National Flag.

sub_questions.explanation: A national flag is the symbol of independence and sovereignty of a country. Every free nation of the world has its own national flag. It introduces a country to the whole world. As a free nation, we also have a national flag of our own. We achieved this flag through a bloody. war against the Pakistani military forces in 1971. The shape of our national flag is rectangular. The ratio of its length and width is 10 : 6 10: 6 10 : 6 . It is made of cotton, linen or silk. It bears a combination of two colours. The major part of it is deep green and there is a red circle in the middle of it. The radius of the circle is one-fifth of the length of the flag. Its deep green colour' stands for everlasting youth, freshness and vigour of our nation. It also symbolises the greenery of Bangladesh. On the other hand, the red circle symbolises the rising sun of independence. It also stands for the supreme sacrifices of our heroic freedom fighters, who laid down their lives for thè independence of our motherland. The flag is hoisted every day on the top of the buildings of government semi-government offices and educational institutions. Moreover, it is hoisted everywhere on the Independent Day and the Victory Day. Besides, it is kept half-mast, on our national mourning days. Our national flag is the source of our spirit, hope, and aspiration: So, we must defend our independence at any cost and save the existence and prestige of our national flag.

questions.uddipok: Write a composition on The Season You Like Most.

sub_questions.explanation:
There are six seasons in Bangladesh, the land of natural beauty. They are summer, rainy, autumn, late autumn, winter and spring. Every season has its unique features. Of all these seasons I like the spring most.. This season consists of the Bangla months of Falgun and Chaitra. It is the best, the loveliest and the most charming of all the seasons. There are some specific reaons why I like the spring most.
To me, the winter is very cold, dull and lifeless. In summer, the scorching sun, hot days and nights make life miserable. The heavy rain and frequent floods in the rainy season bring great sufferings to the people. The autumn and the late autumn have also more or less the disadvantages like the summer, rainy and winter seasons. But the spring has none of the inconveniences of these seasons. Coming after winter, it captivates the hearts of all.
With the arrival of the spring, nature puts on a lively look. Everything in the nature looks fresh. The sky looks' clear and blue, trees put forth new leaves, and the flowers of charming colour and scent bloom in trees. Bees and butterflies hum and fly from one flower to another. During this season, gentle breeze begins to blow. Sweet twitters of birds are heard. The melodious notes of the cuckoo please our ears. All these charming and pleasing sights and sounds have a positive influence on our mind. Everywhere there is joy and mirth. People also enjoy a better health. Besides, during this time, various kinds of vegetables and fruits are also available. The season has a few disadvantages, too. During this season, some people suffer from diseases like diarrhoea, cholera, chicken-pox, etc.
In spite of its few disadvantages, its positive aspects are overwhelming. The convenience it offers fascinates all. That's why, I like the spring season most.
